original_text: Saying, Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests, and unto the scribes; and they shall condemn him to death, and shall deliver him to the Gentiles:
korean_text: 보라 우리가 예루살렘에 올라가노니 인자가 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 넘겨지매 그들이 죽이기로 결의하고 이방인들에게 넘겨 주겠고

sentences.original_text: Saying, Behold, we go up to Jerusalem
and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests
and they shall condemn him to death
and shall deliver him to the Gentiles
